issue.title: [CF 982] [Beta] Suggestion List is Gone (Except Groups)
issue.body:
http://puu.sh/aITjn/d110a9d486.jpg

Panic


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #982 | Raw

comments.body:
If the changelog pops up when you log in open the icon editor, it means I told it to. In this case,

Quote:

IMPORTANT: The suggestion list for spells has been disabled build 18689 because Blizzard's tooltip for spells crashes the game for many spellIDs (too many for me to manually filter out).

Edited Aug 7, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Fair enough, thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy

I'm using g581906b on the beta, and all of a sudden the suggestion lists are back.

A new build was pushed during test, 18702, so I imagine maybe something with that fixed it? Though you might know why TMW suddenly flipped it all back on itself.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy

Yeah, that build fixed the issue. The line I had in there to disable the spell cache was for that single build only since I figured they would fix this one quickly.

Edited Aug 7, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
